Text: Sorry to be a dick, but what's the point of this torrent?? This version is OLD, like really really old (the current one is 5.2.1 for ML, even the last one for Snow Leopard is 3.10.1), it's available for free anyway on tonymacx86.com, and in addition, the guys who provide this great piece of software politely ask not to distribute this stuff elsewhere.
